sentence.Network_en: Our whole programme is spiritually oriented but not religious.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的整个节目都是关注心灵的，但却不是宗教性的。

sentence.Network_en: Most students here are oriented to computers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里的大部分学生都对计算机感兴趣。

sentence.Network_en: Our students are oriented towards science subjects.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们教的学生都是理科方向的。

entry.tran: 以…为方向的；对…感兴趣的；重视…的
entry.def: If someone is oriented towards or oriented to a particular thing or person, they are mainly concerned with that thing or person.

example.ex: It seems almost inevitable that North African economies will still be primarily oriented towards Europe...
example.tran: 看来北非经济体几乎注定还将以欧洲为主导。

example.ex: Most students here are oriented to computers.
example.tran: 这里的大部分学生都对计算机感兴趣。

means.word_mean: 1. adjusted or located in relation to surroundings or circumstances; sometimes used in combination;

sentences.sentence: "the house had its large windows oriented toward the ocean view"
"helping freshmen become oriented to college life"
